definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: Please return the completed form to your school.
sentences.chinese: 请连同家长回条交回学校。

sentences.english: Note: Please use one reply slip for each participant. Thank you.
sentences.chinese: 请每名參加者填写回条一份，谢谢。

sentences.english: Simply fill in the "REPLY SLIP" below for an official application form.
sentences.chinese: 请即填妥以下回条并传真回本局索取申请表格。

sentences.english: Please sign and fax the reply slip to us for record purpose.
sentences.chinese: 请填妥下列回条，并传真或寄回本馆以作纪录。

definition: receipt (written acknowledgement of receipt of an item)
newsletter/the news in brief/(Tw) SMS message
to wash one's hands of sth/to have nothing further to do with sth
to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve
